recipes.title: burgers
directions: Chop up the vegetables to your liking.
Divide the beef into quarters and fire up the grill.
Cook the beef patties for about 7 minutes per side.
After the patties are done cooking, char the burger buns on the grill for about 30 seconds.
Pull the buns and add the beef, cheese, and veggies (can use leftover vegetables for a salad).

recipes.title: pancakes
directions: Mix the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt together.
In a separate bowl beat the eggs, milk, and oil.
Combine the flour mixture with the egg mix and stir.
On a hot gridle pour out the pancake mix.
Cook until the pancakes are bubbling and then flip.
Pull them from the pan once they're done.
